root.name: Pirates of New Horizons
root.description: OverviewPirates of New Horizons is an action/adventure game developed by Exit Strategy Entertainment. Pirates of New Horizons is currently in development for the PC and Mac platforms with Xbox 360 and Playstation 3 versions planned.A preview version of the game can be played at the games official website at http://www.piratesofnewhorizons.com/
